description: Update a prediction knowledge base question
permissions: Allowed for admins and broker admins. Members who can manage gaps on the prediction subject can update when a prediction subject is present. The creator can update their own question as long as they are not changing status to resolved or dismissed.
side_effects: Updates can regenerate the associated answer when title or description changes. Status changes can trigger an async recap generation for the linked prediction subject.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (prediction knowledge base question ID). At least one of --title, --description, --status, or --prediction-subject must be provided. --prediction-subject can be set to an empty string to clear it. status must be one of: open, resolved, dismissed. Status updates may be restricted by policy.
